      • copyFile

        private void copyFile(java.io.File source,
                      java.io.File destination)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Copies the source File to the destination File using byte stream
        Parameters:
        source - The File which is to be copied
        destination - The file where the source File is copied
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the Source or Destination File is not found
        See Also:
        FileInputStream, FileOutputStream
